title: 1887 N172 Old Judge Hoss Radbourn portrait
author: ghostmarcelle

posts.post_title: 1887 N172 Old Judge Hoss Radbourn portrait
posts.post_content: This is a virtual twin to the one that just sold for $4200 in Legendary, except the back is in much better shape.  Incredible condition on the front with unimprovable image quality (razor sharp focus shows every minute detail), and the back has a thin layer of paper loss about the size of a quarter.  $3700 ppd.
Once again, great card, Matt. That would be an ideal pick-up for the underbidder from Legendary.......
